posts.post_content:
I have a few T49s for sale, pretty tough set from schultes "own" brand. The set is generic college scenes with a few sports themed ones. The 3 shown here are baseball and football, the others will be over on the non-sports side soon.  
All are hand cut. The original find I had in late 2009 and some bought recently, probably from the same source. About 30-35 altogether, all hand cut.   
First one - Yale Football. One bad corner, and a crease at the upper right. 
This is one of the tougher cards, It wasn't checklisted till I found one in the first batch [url]http://www1.coe.neu.edu/~dan/T49/go.html[/url] This is a second one. $125
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3245[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3246[/IMG]

Second one Bowdoin Baseball. Also hand cut, but full borders. light creasing at the upper left corner. Small scuff near the college seal  $150
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3249[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3248[/IMG]

Third one, also Bowdoin. Smaller borders, and the surface is slightly dirty/dusty. No creases $150
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3247[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3250[/IMG]

Most forms of payment are ok, prices include priority mail. I can do registered at cost if you want. 
I would also consider trades.
I'll do either Emails or PMs in the order they come in (I'm not expecting any big rush, but just in case...) 

Steve B
